term.title: Bohr radius

item.text: Atomic fundamental physical constant used as atomic unit of length: a0 = (4π.ɛ0.ℏ2/me.e2) = 5.29177249(24) x 10E-11 m the elementary charge, ℏ the Planck constant divided by 2π and m e the electron rest mass.
